message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $85 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $85. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $87 for the product.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to get at least $88 for this. It's a final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to be flexible. I am willing to pay up to $86 for the product.
